title: Ayaz lauds security forces for successful operation against Fitna-e-Khawarij
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 04 (APP):Speaker of National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq Friday lauded security forces for a successful operation against the Indian-supported Fitna-e-Khawarij along with Pakistan-Afghanistan border.
In a statement issued by the National Assembly Secretariat, Ayaz Sadiq paid glowing tribute to the forces, specifically commending them for eliminating 30 Fitna-e-Khawarij during the operation.
“The timely and effective action against terrorists is a testament to the security forces’ professional capabilities,” the Speaker said.
He emphasized that “India-backed terrorists are being brought to justice.”
Expressing national solidarity, the Speaker asserted, “The entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with security forces against Fitna-e-Khawarij.”
He highlighted the nation’s pride in its security institutions, saying, “The nation is proud of the sacrifices and bravery of its security institutions.”
